home.parrafo-info: Programming student focused on frontend web development. I am passionate about creating intuitive and aesthetically pleasing designs, always aiming to provide the best user experience in my projects.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi: I am an undergraduate student in Systems Engineering and Computer Science, self-taught in Web Development focused on both Frontend and Backend programming. I am to find a job in the Web Development field, gain experience, acquire new knowledge, and strengthen my professional life. I am an empathetic and enthusiastic person, with skills focused on teamwork, assertive communication, problem-solving, responsibility, and proactivity. I enjoy learning from others and continuously improving myself.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: Attractive travel and tourism landing page, with sections for popular destinations, recommended places, and a simple and intuitive design.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: A precise overview of me, my skills, education, and projects, all in an interactive, attractive, and professional web portfolio.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: A page that simulates basic actions like listing, deleting, editing, and adding tasks. Completed tasks cannot be deleted or updated.
